name: Downey
shortDescription: A family-friendly city with rich aerospace history, parks, and a vibrant community atmosphere.
fullDescription: Downey is a well-established city in southeast Los Angeles County, known for its aerospace heritage and welcoming neighborhoods. It offers abundant parks, cultural attractions, and community events that make it ideal for families and professionals alike. The city's central location provides easy access to freeways and nearby employment hubs, while its historic sites and diverse dining options add to its charm.
heroImageAlt: Residential street in Downey with palm trees and homes

neighborhoods.description: A diverse city known for its parks, shopping centers, and accessible location.

neighborhoods.name: Cerritos
neighborhoods.description: Upscale community known for shopping, parks, and quality schools.

highlights.title: Columbia Memorial Space Center
highlights.description: A museum dedicated to space exploration and STEM education.

highlights.title: Downey Theatre
highlights.description: Historic theater hosting live performances and community events.

highlights.title: Rio San Gabriel Park
highlights.description: Large park with picnic areas, playgrounds, and walking trails.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Tree-lined path in a city park

highlights.title: Downey Farmers Market
highlights.description: Weekly market offering fresh produce, crafts, and local goods.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Colorful market stalls with fresh fruits

faqs.question: What is Downey known for?
faqs.answer: Downey is known for its aerospace history, family-friendly environment, and community parks.

faqs.question: How is the real estate market in Downey?
faqs.answer: The market offers affordable family homes with steady demand and competitive pricing.

faqs.question: What are popular activities in Downey?
faqs.answer: Visiting the Columbia Memorial Space Center, enjoying local parks, and attending community events are popular.

faqs.question: How is commuting from Downey?
faqs.answer: Downey has easy access to the 605 and 5 freeways, making commutes to Los Angeles and Orange County convenient.
